subject: Sexual Health
title: Condoms Ruin the Experience Myth
description: One-minute skill: Condoms Ruin the Experience Myth.

hook.text: The claim that condoms ruin pleasure is one of the most common excuses for not using protection.

buildup.text: Modern condoms are thinner, better fitting, and more varied than ever before in shape, material, and texture.

discovery.text: Studies show that most people report minimal difference in pleasure when using properly fitted condoms.

twist.text: The anxiety of unprotected sex, worrying about STIs and pregnancy, may reduce pleasure more than a condom does.

climax.text: Finding the right size and type of condom makes a significant difference in comfort and sensation.

punchline.text: Better fit, better feel. No excuses needed.

quiz.question: What do studies say about condoms and pleasure?
options: Most report minimal difference with proper fit
